reviews.review: Fun, but redundant after a while- Still would recommend if you had a squad to play with! The new killer was a great addition.

GRA JEST SWIETNA POLECAM

Death Is Not an Escape.

Dead by Daylight is a multiplayer (4vs1) horror game where one player takes on the role of the savage Killer, and the other four players play as Survivors, trying to escape the Killer and avoid being caught, tortured and killed.

Survivors play in third-person and have the advantage of better situational awareness. The Killer plays in first-person and is more focused on their prey.

The Survivors' goal in each encounter is to escape the Killing Ground without getting caught by the Killer - something that sounds easier than it is, especially when the environment changes every time you play.
Pretty good job so far!

I enjoy this game for what it is but once you play it for awhile it get stale very quick, its really fun for awhile (if you have friends with you it lasts longer) but after that it dies because there's only one thing to do, only one gamemode. I do recommend it because when your learning the game it is actually pretty scary sometimes and very fun and the killer gameplay is also very fun learning and even more fun after that, but the game dies quick which is justified by the small pricetag.

Gameplay is just doing the same thing over & over again.

[b][u]Survivor[/u][/b]:
                                                                                                          
[*] Complete four gens 
[*] Help out other teammates 
[*] hide/run from killer   

[b][u]Killer[/u][/b]:

[*] Find and kill the survivors 
[*] stop the generators from being completed

Очень интересная и, что самое важное, уникальная в своем роде игра, которая постоянно обновляется и развивается, что позволяет не заскучать от геймплея, поскольку тот не успевает стать однообразным. Нравится, что разработчики прислушиваются к игрокам и фиксят баги и придумывают новые механики для более комфортных игр. Радуют маньяки и их умения, это позволяет выбрать - убивать по стелсу или рашить выживших. Рекомендую игру, она точно не даст заскучать и порой может пощекотать нервишки.
